bio:
Asbjorn Fire-Tamer is a Nord man who lives in Riften. He is the apprentice blacksmith to Balimund at The Scorched Hammer. He has short hair and a medium-length beard.
Asbjorn was left at Honorhall Orphanage when he was only a baby; according to Grelod the Kind, his parents didn't want him (though given Grelod's cruel nature, this may not be true). Balimund adopted Asbjorn when he was a young boy in order to make the boy his apprentice. Asbjorn then quickly learned that he possessed a natural affinity for smithing  as has been working hard to learn the trade ever since.
Asbjorn has deep gratitude and admiration for Balimund, and hopes to someday be as good of a smith as Balimund is. Asbjorn can be found inside The Scorched Hammer most of the day.
Quotes:
“I used to live at the orphanage here in Riften. Grelod said my ma and da left me there when I was a baby... that they didn't want me."
"Folks in town say that Balimund is the greatest blacksmith in all of Tamriel. I hope I can live up to that someday and make him proud of me."
"Balimund took me in and has been so kind to me. I don't know why, but he thinks I can be a great blacksmith like him."
"Have you met Balimund? I'm his apprentice. He's teaching me all about being a blacksmith."
"At first I don't know why he picked me. I had never even held a hammer in my life! But the first time I picked it up, it just felt right!"
name: Asbjorn Fire-Tamer
